text: The 2016–17 season is the 34th season in Segunda División played by Real Oviedo, a Spanish football club based in Oviedo, Asturias. It covers a period from 1 July 2016 to 30 June 2017. == Season overview == === Pre-season === == Players == === Squad information === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:85%; width:100%;" |- !
